nodes.text: Show Girls was a stage entertainment show, active on Coruscant during the Clone Wars. It featured scantily clad female performers. The show was promoted via posters, and screen advertisements on hover taxis, which stated the name of the show in Aurebesh letters.
The female Twi'lek used to advertise the show is wearing an outfit similar to Princess Leia's Huttese slave-girl costume in Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi.
